text.text_translated:
Good relationships are very important to be happy.
One study looked at happy people.
It found they have strong relationships with friends and family.
They spend time with them often.
Self-disclosure is when you talk about your personal feelings with someone.
You need to have at least one person for self-disclosure.
One person for a deep talk is enough.
You also need other friends.
It is not enough to have many friends just for fun.
You can do things with them or talk about music.
But a strong relationship is very important.
Some people need to learn to listen well.
This helps them make their relationships stronger.
